alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 6:36PM CDT until July 07 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Beaver County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Northwestern Lipscomb County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northern Ochiltree County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 635 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Forgan to 5 miles east of Boyd to 6 miles north of Farnsworth, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Perryton, Lipscomb, Beaver, Booker, Forgan, Follett, Darrouzett, Gate, Knowles, Elmwood, Boyd, Floris, Bryans Corner, Mocane, Turpin, Slapout, Balko and Farnsworth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
